thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 2 de 698
thread.title: Sond

author: Sond
title: Sond
text: We rented a car from them and the customer service is really bad. They charge you for fuel (by mistake?), even if you have rented ful to full. They deliver the car with the tank not full, and you will not get the money back for missing fuel. They get angry if you don't want to pay for ensurance. My advice: Find another company. I got the money back for the extra charge of the fuel, but not for the missing fuel
